sentence: Mandela Barnes and State Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, along with Alex Lasry, an executive with the Milwaukee Bucks, and Tom Nelson, a county executive.
title: Nobody's Getting Special Treatment in 2022

sentence: Mandela Barnes, state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry and Tom Nelson, the Outagamie County executive.
title: Republicans 'all in' for Ron Johnson's Senate re-election fight in Wisconsin

sentence: Mandela Barnes (D) leading that primary field with 23 percent support, with Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry trailing at 13 percent support, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson garnering five percent support and State Treasurer Sarah Godlewski three percent.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Democratic group runs ad hitting Ron Johnson over Trump 2017 tax bill

sentence: I'm not running just to check the box.? (That's an implicit dig at one of his primary opponents, Alex Lasry, the son of a billionaire who has never run for office.)
title: Opinion: Wisconsin's Tom Nelson reminds Democrats how populists should sound
